description:
If you are like one of the thousands of other people out there who want to build a website but DON'T want to mess around with coding, web architecture, or databases then this course is for you. In this course you will learn how to:

  • Build Your Own WordPress Website
  • Install A Brand New Theme With Demo Content
  • Create A Great User Experience With 3 Important Plugins
  • Expand Your Knowledge of The Best Content Management System In Existence

But Why WordPress?

WordPress currently powers 24% of ALL websites currently live on the internet. Just think about that for a second. A full quarter of the internet runs on the backbone of this FREE framework. In this course I will teach you how to be on the winning side of the internet.
title: Learn To Set Up Your Own WordPress Website; Step By Step!
